name: Covid Defence
description:
--THIS GAME IS A JOKE--

CONTROLS:
Movement: WASD or ARROWS
Aim: Mouse Movement
Shoot: Left Click
Pause/Buy Guns: Escape

While giving out the COVID-19 Vaccine, governments around the world have planted microchips in our brains, oringially with the idea that they would be able to control everyone. But because the microchips are so extremely unstable, they took over the database they were running on and are now on their own mission to control humanity. You are a cell in a human body. Defend the brain from the microchips at all cost.
